about.title: About me
about.content: I'm an dynamic Web developer (backend mainly) with 6+ years of experience in different techonologies like JAVA, Ruby on Rails, or SAP. Flirting with DevOps. Eager to improve my career with different experiences, while supporting the team as much as possible.

interests.interest: Fan of tech and gadgets blogs
Proactive and autodidact while learning new technologies
Assistant coach in Granada Lions, american football team

softSkills: Ability to quickly learn new technologies and methodologies
Team player - One for all and all for one!

responsibilities.head: As part of the backend team, I take part of developing and adding new features to the Sonata DSP and its environment using different technologies:
elements: Evolution of bidding system with hexagonal architecture
Usage of Java 11/17 and NodeJS as languages. MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AWS, Kafka, ElasticSearch are also present on the stack.
Support to other teams when using our APIs and solving issues for support team
Monitoring of the systems using Grafana/Prometheus. We attend over 5K requests per second!
We own the CI/CD process. With support from DevOps team, it is our responsability to design, test, and deploy new features.

responsibilities.head: Integration of company's biometric solutions to web platforms:
elements: Creation and maintenance of Web SDKs implementing native libraries (Javascript, Typescript, WASM)
Demo Apps implementing those SDKs for potential customers (Angular, Vue.js)
Support to customer when integrating our solutions on their projects
Integration of native libraries in backend server (Java 11, Spring Boot, JNI, C++)

responsibilities.head: Also, using my previous experience, some tasks in CI/CD flow:
elements: Design of a full pipeline for each of the web-related repositories
Helping in choosing the tools and architecture to be used (AWS)

responsibilities.head: Development of Time management application for ELCA's internal use:
elements: Focused in Front-end development using Angular 8 and Bootstrap. TDD using Jest and Karma. (3 months)
Support to backend tasks with JAVA 11 + SpringBoot

responsibilities.head: Then, in SecuTix (an ELCA's company), as part of the platform team:
elements: Tech stack in JAVA 11 + Spring + Hibernate + ActiveMQ. CI/CD with Jenkins. Oracle DB. Quality monitoring using Selenium, Integration Tests, Fitnesse, Postman, SONAR
Design, support and development of public APIs in SOAP and REST
Development of connectors and interfaces to external systems
Direct support to customer's integrators willing to use our APIs
Using SCRUM methodology with JIRA and applying TDD with JUnit and Mockito
Responsible of migration to microservices for external connectors

responsibilities.head: Ruby on Rails Application, development driven by Agile methodologies. Developing NGA's flagship, hrX Exchange:
elements: Working both in Backend and Frontend using technologies as MongoDB, MySQL, jQuery, Bootstrap, HAML, CoffeeScript, Angular 6, SASS, Javascript, and, of course, Ruby on Rails framework.
Following TDD process with RSPEC to test our application. Maintenance and usage of Docker for usage of the application.

responsibilities.head: Technical SAP HCM Non Payroll consultant, specialized in Talent Management modules:
elements: Technical and functional deeper knowledge of Talent Modules (Performance, Learning, Compensation, e-Recruiting)
Modification of customer's frontend system based on Javascript, jQuery, Prototype, and CSS.
Web Application development and maintenance for GDPR Compliance of customers
Maintenance and develop of website using PHP4, and Javascript
MySQL Database management and queries design

courses.title: Some Udemy courses related to TDD, BDD, Angular, Docker, Kubernetes
